member.name: M:GM_Warehouse.Components.Services.OrdersController.GetOrderFromId(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves an order based on its ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the order.
member.response: If the order is not found.

member.name: M:GM_Warehouse.Components.Services.OrdersController.CreateOrder(GM_Warehouse.Components.Models.CreateModels.OrderCreateModel)
member.param: The details of the order to create.
member.returns: The created order's details and its URI.
member.response: If the input data is invalid.

member.name: M:GM_Warehouse.Components.Services.OrdersController.GetAllOrders
member.returns: A list of all orders in the system.

member.name: M:GM_Warehouse.Components.Services.OrdersController.GetOrderFromSalesman(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves all orders placed by a specific salesman.
member.param: The unique identifier of the salesman.
member.returns: A list of orders associated with the salesman.
member.response: Returns a list of orders for the salesman.
If no orders are found for the given salesman.
